name: Lava River
description:
Lava. Who wants Lava?
Everybody. Everybody wants Lava.
You want Lava. The evil Blobs want Lava.
Protect your precious Lava River from the Blobs.

How does one protect a Lava River, you ask?
One word. Turrets. LAVA POWERED TURRETS.
[LEFT CLICK] on the Lava River. Bim Bam Boom. Turret built. River Flow changed.

Changing the river flow can be a powerful tool in your fight against the Blobs.
To move the River away from the Blobs! To trap the Blobs! To kill the Blobs with boiling hot Lava! Ah, the pleasure of using the Lava River to protect the Lava River!

To decide how to alter the flow of the River, rotate your Turrets!
PRESS [X] before building the turret to rotate it! (You can also middle click on the river)
PRESS [C] to switch the turret type! (You can also middle click on the turret)
Small Turrets go bim bim but big Turrets go BAM BAM BAM
But be careful! Big Turrets use more Lava! If the River is too dry, no big Turrets.

You want to restore the Lava River to how it was at the beginning?
Destroy Turrets! [RIGHT CLICK] on the Turret and BOOM Turret is no more.
All Turrets that are downstream of that one will be destroyed too! BOOM BOOM BOOM

How many evil Blobs can you kill?
(You'll have to count, there's no scoring system!)

Controls:
Build Turret: Right Click / Space
Rotate Turret: X / Middle Mouse Button on River
Switch Turret Type: C / Middle Mouse Button on Turret
Destroy Turret: Left Click / V

Game by Luc Deligne
Made with Aseprite & Godot
Created in 12 days for the Go Godot Jam 2 under the theme 'Energy Source'
